title: Trimlas Tales: The Return Of The Necromancer
description: “A humorous tale of remarkable courage, magic and friendship in the face of the pure evil” In the city of Seaforth, there is a secretive guild of agents called the King's Reach. They work in the shadows, ensuring that the King knows all that is happening throughout the lands of Trimlas. Tomas Sneak has just had his thirteenth birthday and is hoping to become the youngest member of the Reach, but a Necromancer's evil plans for total domination threaten to change everything. Teamed with a young girl of questionable magical abilities, they follow their fathers and travel further into danger than most adults would even dare to contemplate.
author: Chris M. Brown
